comment: See http://www.kiva.org/legal/terms#Section%202. f you post, upload, submit, transmit or otherwise share any messages or other content, information, images, photographs, pictures or other materials on the Website or to Kiva in connection with or arising from your participation in the Program, including without limitation any feedback provided to Kiva (collectively, "User Generated Content"), you agree to grant, and hereby grant to Kiva an irrevocable, perpetual, non-exclusive, fully-paid, worldwide license to: (a) use, copy, perform, display and distribute the User Generated Content; (b) modify, alter, prepare derivative works of, and/or incorporate into other works, the User Generated Content; and (c) grant and authorize sublicenses of the foregoing.
